channel.title: AP on Engineering Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in AP on Engineering Field Notes

item.title: 瘦AP一般能干嘛
item.description: 在讨论无线的时候，通常都会问到：“瘦AP都有些什么功能？” 或者 “AP和WLC各负责什么？” 瘦AP一般的功能包括： Real-Time 802.11/MAC Functionality: Beacon Generation Probe Response Power management/Packet buffering 802.11e/WMM scheduling, queueing MAC
